rules.natural: If the oven is connected to Wi-Fi, then provided that internet is not available in the kitchen, safety mode is enabled for the oven.
Either the oven is connected to Wi-Fi or the oven is synchronizing with a server.
Provided that the oven is synchronizing with a server, the oven performs a cloud backup.
In the event that the oven is performing a cloud backup, data is uploaded from the oven.
If a manual backup is performed for the oven, then local storage is active for the oven.

Provided that a mobile device is connected to the oven, if it is not the case that data being uploaded implies that lack of internet leads to safety mode, then a manual backup is performed for the oven.
A mobile device is connected to the oven or a tablet is connected to the oven.
If a tablet is connected to the oven, then whenever it is false that data upload implies no internet causes safety mode, a manual backup occurs for the oven.
Under the condition that the kitchen game is running, internet is available in the kitchen.
Provided that the oven temperature is within the acceptable range, the oven has power turned on.
The Europe region is enabled or the USA region is enabled.
If the USA region is enabled, then video is being streamed from the kitchen game or the kitchen game is running.
In the event that a VPN is active for the kitchen game, if it is not the case that Europe region enabled implies video streaming or game running, then the kitchen game is geo-blocked.
A VPN is active for the kitchen game or a proxy is enabled for the kitchen game.
The phone is offline or internet is available in the kitchen.
If the phone has low battery, then the phone is not offline.
Whenever the phone is charging, the phone is not offline.
Provided that a cable is connected to the phone, the phone has low battery.
A cable is connected to the phone or the phone is wirelessly charging.
If the wall outlet is the power source, then whenever the phone is wirelessly charging, the phone is charging.
The wall outlet is the power source or a power bank is the power source.
Provided that a power bank is the power source, if the phone is wirelessly charging, then the phone is charging.
The speaker is muted or internet is available in the kitchen.
Under the condition that a temperature alert is active for the oven, a cooking error has not occurred in the oven.
If a timer is set for the oven, then provided that the oven has power turned on, if internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.
Whenever a power failure has affected the oven, a cooking error has not occurred in the oven.
If there is a device conflict between the oven and the speaker, then the oven does not have priority in the kitchen.
There is a device conflict between the oven and the speaker or a temperature alert is active for the oven or a power failure has affected the oven.
In the event that there is a schedule conflict in the kitchen, the time has been adjusted in the kitchen.
There is a schedule conflict in the kitchen or the speaker does not have priority for audio.
If a diagnostic run is being performed on the oven, then provided that it is not the case that power on implies no internet leads to not cooking active, the oven undergoes a system reset.
A diagnostic run is being performed on the oven or the oven is in maintenance mode.
Provided that the oven is in maintenance mode, if it is false that power on leads to no internet causing not cooking active, then the oven undergoes a system reset.
Under the condition that the oven is in standby mode, if internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.
If a recipe is selected for the oven, then whenever the oven has power turned on, provided that internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.
In the event that auto-shutdown is active for the oven, then provided that the oven has power turned on, the oven is in standby mode.
Auto-shutdown is active for the oven or energy saver mode is enabled for the oven.
Provided that energy saver mode is enabled for the oven, if the oven has power turned on, the oven is in standby mode.
If override is active for the oven, then manual control is active for the oven.
Whenever soup is ready to serve, a timer is set for the oven.
Under the condition that pizza is fully prepared, a recipe is selected for the oven.
In the event that it is not the case that temperature okay implies no internet leads to not cooking active, a cooking error occurs in the oven.
Provided that it is not the case that Europe region enabled leads to video streaming or game running, the kitchen game is not geo-blocked.
Whenever it is not the case that proxy enabled implies that lack of Europe region implication leads to geo-blocked, the connection is secure for the kitchen game.
If it is false that proxy enabled implies that no Europe region implication causes geo-blocked, then the connection is not secure for the kitchen game.
In the event that it is false that audio settings imply that volume control leads to not muted, sound is disabled for the speaker.
If it is not the case that device conflict implies oven priority, then the speaker has priority for audio.
Provided that it is false that soup is ready or pizza is prepared, emergency override is active for the oven.
Whenever it is not the case that lack of audio settings implication leads to not sound disabled, audio is enabled for the speaker.
If it is false that no audio settings implication causes not sound disabled, then audio is not enabled for the speaker.
Provided that it is false that lack of internet implies not cooking active, override is active for the oven.
In the event that it is not the case that no internet leads to not cooking active, manual control is not active for the oven.
If internet is not available in the kitchen, then the oven is actively cooking.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → A52).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that no internet leads to not cooking active, manual control is active for the oven.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → A53).natural: Provided that it is false that lack of internet implies not cooking active, override is active for the oven.

(¬(¬G → ¬A1) → ¬A52).natural: In the event that it is not the case that no internet leads to not cooking active, manual control is not active for the oven.

(¬G → A1).natural: If internet is not available in the kitchen, then the oven is actively cooking.

(¬G → A9).natural: Whenever internet is not available in the kitchen, safety mode is enabled for the oven.

(¬G → ¬A1).natural: Provided that internet is not available in the kitchen, the oven is not actively cooking.

A2.natural: The oven temperature is within the acceptable range.

A34.natural: Volume control is available for the speaker.

A35.natural: Audio settings are configured for the speaker.

G.natural: Internet is available in the kitchen.

¬A14.natural: Local storage is not active for the oven.

¬A19.natural: Video is not being streamed from the kitchen game.

¬A38.natural: A cooking error has not occurred in the oven.

¬A41.natural: There is no device conflict between the oven and the speaker.

¬A43.natural: The speaker does not have priority for audio.

¬A44.natural: There is no schedule conflict in the kitchen.

¬A45.natural: The time has not been adjusted in the kitchen.

¬A46.natural: The oven has not undergone a system reset.

¬A8.natural: Emergency override is not active for the oven.

¬A9.natural: Safety mode is not enabled for the oven.
